Sr. Administrative Support/Interview Coordinator Intel Corporation July 2010  –  February 2011  (8 months) As the executive administrator to two Directors and one hiring manager (Director of Digital Home Group - Software Group, Director of Marketing, and HR), my responsibilities included providing administration support to the directors and the software, marketing and HR teams (25). I assumed a lead role in the Arizona HPG Activities Committee, which included organizing and coordinating group events for the 70 employees within HPG. Summary Barbara is a highly motivated and dedicated employee with many years of progressively challenging experiences. Her professional background spans through many industry facets including Banking, Computer Technology, Design, Healthcare, Insurance, Manufacturing, Wholesale Fuels, and the Large Format Print Industry. Barbara easily adapts to new concepts and responsibilities. She possesses and exhibits the ability to handle confidential and sensitive information with discretion and professionalism. Additionally, she is adept in client needs assessment, problem identification, complaint resolution, customer tracking, and assuring customer satisfaction. Barbara wants to share her skills with an employer who wants a high quality employee on their team; one that will be a quantifiable asset to their company. Specialties:QB, NetSuite, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Typing 60wpm. Excellent spelling, grammar, composition, proofreading & editing skills. Outstanding interpersonal & negotiation skills.
